removeInsurance(uint256).details: Only be called by the owner of the contract

params.amount: Amount of tokens withdrawn for settlement

IncreOwnable_NotOwner().notice: Emitted when the sender is not the owner

IncreOwnable_NotPendingOwner().notice: Emitted when the sender is not the pending owner

IncreOwnable_TransferZeroAddress().notice: Emitted when the proposed owner is equal to the zero address

Insurance_ClearingHouseZeroAddress().notice: Emitted when the proposed clearingHouse address is equal to the zero address

Insurance_InsufficientBalance().notice: Emitted when the balance of the vault is less than the amount to be settled

Insurance_InsufficientInsurance().notice: Emitted when locked insurance falls below insurance ratio

Insurance_SenderNotClearingHouse().notice: Emitted when the sender is not the clearingHouse address

Insurance_SenderNotVault().notice: Emitted when the sender is not the vault address

Insurance_ZeroAddressConstructor(uint8).notice: Emitted when the zero address is provided as a parameter in the constructor

PRBMath__MulDivFixedPointOverflow(uint25.notice: Emitted when the result overflows uint256.

ClearingHouseChanged(address).notice: Emitted when a new ClearingHouse is connected to the issuer

InsuranceRemoved(uint256).notice: Emitted when (exceeding) insurance reserves are withdrawn by governance

SettleDebt(uint256).notice: Emitted when a bail out is asked for by the Vault

SystemDebtGenerated(uint256).notice: Emitted when a bail out cant be fully served

removeInsurance(uint256).notice: Withdraw remaining balance of the contract

settleDebt(uint256).notice: Settle bad debt generated by the vault

systemBadDebt().notice: Debt which could not be settled by insurance

userdoc.notice: Pays out Vault in case of default
